transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello sir.
Customer: Ji Bharat Murti Art.
Executive: Sir, ${Exec_Name} IndiaMART se baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Sir aapki ticket aayi thi buyleads vagarah ko leke.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir, uske regarding mein aapse baat karna chah raha tha.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Sir aapko sir jo sir aap is product mein deal kar rahe hain na sir aap marble statue mein deal karte hain na sir.
Customer: Sir aapka na aawaz bahut kam aa raha hai.
Executive: Sir ab aa rahi hai aawaz?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan ji sir. Sir to aap jis product ke andar deal karte hain na marble statues aapka jo product hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir uske andar kya hai sir uske andar sir competition bahut jyada hai sir bahut sare dealers hain koi bhi sir lead ho.
Customer: To hum hum ab aap mujhe ek cheez bataiye hum kis liye baithe hain?
Executive: Sir uske liye main aapko baat kar raha hu sir aap suniye to ek baar.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji sir. Sir to sir aapko koi bhi lead post hoti hai na to sir usme pehle se bahut log baithe rehte hain usme wo matlab wo buyleads use karne ke liye to sir best jo hum kar sakte hain na. Sir best jo aap kar sakte hain sir hamare jo catalog hai usme sir puri puri setting add kar sakte hain. Sir kar sakte hain to sir aur sir regularly sir jaise abhi aap sir IndiaMART pe kitne frequently login karte hain. Matlab check karte hain buyleads vagarah.
Customer: Main aapki main aapki baat karata hu ek minute aap hold rakhoge?
Executive: Haan sir aap baat kara dijiye.
Customer: Ek minute aap hold pe rakho. Main number add kar deta hu call pe na.
Executive: Ji ji.

You are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. The person you are speaking with has put your call on

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji ek minute ruko unka call aa raha hai wapas.

You are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. The person you are speaking with
has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. You are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. You are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. You are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line. You are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji sir wo 7 baje ke baad baat ho payegi.
Executive: Kitne baje ke baad sir?
Customer: 7 baje ke baad ya phir aap mujhe call kar sakte ho kal.
Executive: Kal?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir sir to discussion hum aap jab bhi free ho hum discussion kar lenge sir abhi ke liye main concern close kar du?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi close mat karo usko usko aise hi pade rehne do.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai sir phir main aapko connect karta hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says executive's voice is low.

- Customer asks why they are on IndiaMART.

- Wants to know how to use buyleads effectively.



Resolution:

- Executive explained about competition in marble statues.

- Executive suggested adding full settings to the catalog.

- Executive asked about login frequency on IndiaMART.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will discuss after 7 PM or next day.

- Executive will connect with the customer later.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, login frequency, marble statues
